hymn.title: In some way or other the Lord will provide
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Providing

layout.singingstanza: In some way or oth -- er the Lord will pro -- vide. It may not be my way, it may not be thy way; And yet in His own way, "the Lord will pro -- vide." Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will pro -- vide; Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will pro -- vide.

lyrics.stanza: Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide; Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide.
Despond then no longer; the Lord will provide: And this be the token—no word He hath spoken Was ever yet broken: "The Lord will provide."
